tooltip_text:
Innate: At the start of combat, Assassins leap to the farthest enemy.

Assassins gain bonus Critical Strike Damage and Chance.

(@MinUnits@) +@CritAmpPercent@% Critical Strike Damage & +@CritChanceAmpPercent@% Critical Strike Chance

Blademaster Basic Attacks have a @ProcChance@% chance to trigger additional attacks against their target.

These additional attacks deal damage like Basic Attacks and trigger on-hit effects.

(@MinUnits@) One Additional Attack
(@MinUnits@) Two Additional Attacks
(@MinUnits@) Four Additional Attacks

Brawlers gain bonus Health.

(@MinUnits@) @BonusHealth@ Health

Basic Attacks from Demons have a @ManaDrainProcChance@% chance to reduce their target's Mana by @ManaDrainBurn@ and restore Mana to the Demon.

(@MinUnits@) @ManaDrainDrain@ Mana restored
<row>(@MinUnits@) Dragons gain @MagicReduction@% resistance to Magic Damage</row>

Innate: Elementalists gain double mana from Basic Attacks.

(@MinUnits@) At the start of combat, summon a Golem with 2200 Health to fight alongside your allies
<row>(@MinUnits@) If an Exile has no adjacent allies at the start of combat, they gain a shield equal to @ShieldPercent@% of their maximum Health</row>
(@MinUnits@) Basic Attacks from Glacials have a @ProcPercent@% chance to stun their target for @StunDuration@ seconds and do bonus Magic Damage.
<row>(@MinUnits@) At the start of combat, Guardians grant +@Armor@ Armor to adjacent allies (this bonus can stack any number of times)</row>

Gunslinger Basic Attacks have a @ProcPercent@% chance to fire additional bullets at other enemies within range.

These bullets deal damage like Basic Attacks and apply on-hit effects.

(@MinUnits@) Attack @ExtraTargetsHit@ extra enemies
(@MinUnits@) Attack @ExtraTargetsHit@ extra enemies
(@MinUnits@) Attack @ExtraTargetsHit@ extra enemies

At the start of combat, an ally Hextech launches and detonates a pulse bomb, temporarily disabling nearby enemy items for @DisableDuration@ seconds.

(@MinUnits@) @HexSize@ Hex Radius
(@MinUnits@) @HexSize@ Hex Radius

At the start of combat, select Imperials are empowered to deal double damage.

(@MinUnits@) 1 Random Imperial
(@MinUnits@) All Imperials

All allies block a flat amount of damage from all sources.

(@MinUnits@) @BlockAmount@ Damage Blocked

Ninjas gain bonus Attack Damage and Spell Power.

This trait is only active when you have exactly 1 or 4 unique Ninjas.

(@MinUnits@) Ninja gains +@ADValue@ Attack Damage & +@APValue@% Spell Power
(@MinUnits@) All Ninjas gain +@ADValue@ Attack Damage & +@APValue@% Spell Power

At the start of combat, select allies gain +@Armor@ Armor, +@MagicResist@ Magic Resistance, and heal @Heal@ Health on-hit.

(@MinUnits@) 1 Random Ally
(@MinUnits@) All Allies
<row>(@MinUnits@) At the start of combat, a random enemy's Health is set to @HPToSet@</row>
<row>(@MinUnits@) At the end of each combat against another player, a treasure chest spawns on your arena containing up to 4 gold</row>

Every @ProcRate@ seconds, Rangers have a chance to gain Attack Speed for @ProcRate@ seconds.

(@MinUnits@) @ProcPercent@% chance for @ASMultTooltip@x Attack Speed
(@MinUnits@) Robots start combat at full Mana

Shapeshifters gain bonus Maximum Health when they transform.

(@MinUnits@) @HPPercent@% Bonus Maximum Health

Innate: Sorcerers gain double Mana from Basic Attacks.

All allies have increased Spell Power.

(@MinUnits@) +@AP@% Spell Power
(@MinUnits@) Attacks and spells from Void champions deal true damage.

Select allies' Basic Attacks are empowered to grant +@AttackSpeedPercent@% Bonus Attack Speed (stacks up to 5 times).

(@MinUnits@) Wild Allies Only
(@MinUnits@) All Allies, and allies' basic attacks cannot be dodged.

Yordles gain a chance to dodge enemy Basic Attacks.

(@MinUnits@) @MissPercent@% Chance to Dodge

Altruists heal the lowest Health ally for @PercentDamageToHeal*100@% of damage they deal. Your team gains Armor and Magic Resist.

(@MinUnits@) @Resists@ %i:scaleArmor%%i:scaleMR%

Arcanists gain Ability Power and grant Ability Power to allies.

(@MinUnits@) @TeamAbilityPower@ %i:scaleAP% to all allies.
(@MinUnits@) @ArcanistAbilityPower@ %i:scaleAP% for Arcanists; @TeamAbilityPower@ %i:scaleAP% for others
(@MinUnits@) @ArcanistAbilityPower@ %i:scaleAP% for Arcanists; @TeamAbilityPower@ %i:scaleAP% for others
(@MinUnits@) @ArcanistAbilityPower@ %i:scaleAP% for Arcanists; @TeamAbilityPower@ %i:scaleAP% for others

The Artist paints the champion you place in a special bench slot. Get a 1-star copy of the champion placed there when the Artist's work is complete.

Rounds to Complete = Unit Cost

Behemoths gain increased Armor and Magic Resist. Whenever a Behemoth dies, the nearest Behemoth gains @BonusPercent*100@% more for @Duration@ seconds.

(@MinUnits@) @Defenses@ %i:scaleArmor%%i:scaleMR%

Your team gains @TeamBonusHealth@ maximum Health. Bruisers gain additional maximum Health.

(@MinUnits@) @BonusPercentHealth*100@% %i:scaleHealth%
(@MinUnits@) @BonusPercentHealth*100@% %i:scaleHealth%
(@MinUnits@) @BonusPercentHealth*100@% %i:scaleHealth%
(@MinUnits@) @BonusPercentHealth*100@% %i:scaleHealth%; Every @RefreshSeconds@ seconds, Bruisers deal @SlamPercentHealth*100@% %i:scaleHealth% bonus physical damage on their next attack.

After @FirstDelay@ seconds of combat, the Dragon strikes the board, dealing true damage to enemies and granting all allies Attack Speed for the rest of combat.

(@MinUnits@) @TrueDamageHPRatio*100@% %i:scaleHealth% damage, @AttackSpeedBuff*100@% %i:scaleAS%.
(@MinUnits@) @TrueDamageHPRatio*100@% %i:scaleHealth% damage, @AttackSpeedBuff*100@% %i:scaleAS%.
(@MinUnits@) @TrueDamageHPRatio*100@% %i:scaleHealth% damage and Stuns for @StunDuration@ seconds.
(@MinUnits@) @TrueDamageHPRatio*100@% %i:scaleHealth% damage, @AttackSpeedBuff*100@% %i:scaleAS%.

Dryads gain Ability Power and @StartingHealth@ Health. Each enemy death grants permanent additional Health.

(@MinUnits@) @AP@ %i:scaleAP%; @HealthPerCompost@ %i:scaleHealth% per enemy death

(Total health: @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT11_Trait_DryadHealth@ %i:scaleHealth%)
(Enemies killed: @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT11_Trait_DryadCompost@)

Duelists gain Attack Speed on each attack, stacking up to @MaxStacks@ times.

(@MinUnits@) @AttackSpeedPercent*100@% %i:scaleAS%
(@MinUnits@) @AttackSpeedPercent*100@% %i:scaleAS%
(@MinUnits@) @AttackSpeedPercent*100@% %i:scaleAS%; Duelists take @DamageReduction*100@% less damage
(@MinUnits@) @AttackSpeedPercent*100@% %i:scaleAS%; Duelists take @DamageReduction*100@% less damage

Your team gains @BaseDamageAmp@% bonus damage, plus more based on your level.

After combat, store XP in a Soul Core. Sell the Core to claim the XP.

(@MinUnits@) @DamageAmpPerLevel@% damage per level, @BaseAmountXP@ XP.
(@MinUnits@) @DamageAmpPerLevel@% damage per level, @BaseAmountXP@ XP.

(Current bonus: @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT11_Trait_Exalted_CurrentBonus@%).

Each game a different set of units is Exalted.

Hover one Fated unit over another to form a pair and unlock a Fated Bonus. Your pair gains @PairHPBonus*100@% %i:scaleHealth%.

(@MinUnits@) Pair gets the Fated Bonus.
(@MinUnits@) All Fated champions get @BondIncreasePercent*100@% of the Fated Bonus
(@MinUnits@) All Fated champions get @BondIncreasePercent*100@% of the Fated Bonus
(@MinUnits@) All Fated champions gain @BondIncreasePercent*100@% of EVERY Fated Bonus

When you lose a player combat, gain Luck. The more fights in a row you lose, the more Luck you get.

Lose Luck when you win.

(@MinUnits@) Roll a die; in that many player combats, hold a Festival where you may convert your Luck into rewards.
(@MinUnits@) Heal @Heal@ player health at the start of each player combat.
@TFTUnitProperty.:TFT11_Trait_Fortune7Tooltip@

Each Festival, roll a new die.

Upon dealing or taking damage @NumInstances@ times, Ghostly units send @NumSpectres@ spectres to haunt nearby enemies and heal @HealingPercent*100@% max Health every @TickRate@ seconds.

Haunted enemies take bonus damage for each spectre on them, and pass spectres on death.

(@MinUnits@) @DamagePercent*100@% per spectre
Every @CastCount@ casts, Wukong grows his weapon, modifying his Abilities.

Heavenly units grant unique stats to your team, increased for each Heavenly unit in play.

Heavenly units gain @SelfishHeavenlyBonus*100@% more.

(@MinUnits@) @HeavenlyBonus*100@% bonus.

Kha'Zix -  %i:scaleCrit% @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT11_Trait_Heavenly_Crit@%
Malphite -  %i:scaleArmor% %i:scaleMR% @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT11_Trait_Heavenly_Defenses@
Neeko -  %i:scaleHealth% @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT11_Trait_Heavenly_Health@
Qiyana -  %i:scaleAD% @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT11_Trait_Heavenly_AD@%
Soraka -  %i:scaleAP% @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT11_Trait_Heavenly_AP@%
Wukong -  %i:scaleAS% @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT11_Trait_Heavenly_AS@%
Emblem -  Omnivamp @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT11_Trait_Heavenly_Omnivamp@%

Gain unique Inkshadow items. Inkshadow champions gain @PercentBuff@% bonus damage and damage reduction.

(@MinUnits@) @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT11_Trait_Inkshadow_Item1@
(@MinUnits@) @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT11_Trait_Inkshadow_Item2@ and @IncreasedPercentBuff@% more bonus damage and damage reduction
(@MinUnits@) @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT11_Trait_Inkshadow_Item3@, @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT11_Trait_Inkshadow_Item4@, and @IncreasedPercentBuff@% more bonus damage and damage reduction.

Every @TickRate@ seconds, your units gain Mana.

(@MinUnits@) @TeamMana@ %i:scaleMana% to all allies.
(@MinUnits@) @InvokerMana@ %i:scaleMana% to Invokers; @TeamMana@ %i:scaleMana% to others.
(@MinUnits@) @InvokerMana@ %i:scaleMana% to Invokers; @TeamMana@ %i:scaleMana% to others.

Change which Lover takes the field depending on whether they are placed in the front or back 2 rows.

When the fielded Lover casts, the other provides a bonus effect.

Front: Altruist Rakan
Back: Trickshot Xayah

Mythic champions gain Health, Ability Power, and Attack Damage.

After 4 player combats, they become Epic, increasing the bonus by @Multiplier*100@%.

(@MinUnits@) +@HealthPct*100@% %i:scaleHealth%, @AP@% %i:scaleAP%%i:scaleAD%
(@MinUnits@) +@HealthPct*100@% %i:scaleHealth%, @AP@% %i:scaleAP%%i:scaleAD%
(@MinUnits@) +@HealthPct*100@% %i:scaleHealth%, @AP@% %i:scaleAP%%i:scaleAD%
(@MinUnits@) Instantly become Epic. The bonus is increased by @PrismaticMultiplier*100@% instead.

After casting, Porcelain champions boil, gaining Attack Speed and taking less damage for @Duration@ seconds.

(@MinUnits@) @AS*100@% %i:scaleAS%; @DR*100@% reduced damage

(@MinUnits@) Reapers' Abilities can critically strike and they gain @CritChance*100@% Critical Strike Chance.
(@MinUnits@) Additionally, Reapers bleed enemies for @BleedDamage*100@% bonus true damage over @Duration@ seconds.

Combat start: Allies in the front 2 rows gain Omnivamp. Allies in the back 2 rows gain Ability Power.

(@MinUnits@) @Omnivamp*100@% Omnivamp, @APAmount@ %i:scaleAP%

Innate: Snipers gain @HexRangeIncrease@ Attack Range.

Snipers deal more damage to targets farther away.

(@MinUnits@) @PercentDamageIncrease@% damage per hex.
(@MinUnits@) @PercentDamageIncrease@% damage per hex.
(@MinUnits@) @PercentDamageIncrease@% damage per hex. Snipers gain an additional @BonusHexRangeIncrease@ Attack Range.

The first time the Spirit Walker drops below @RevivePercent*100@% Health, he unleashes the rage within, healing to full Health, gaining increased movement speed, and changing his Ability from Ram Slam to Tiger Strikes.

Storyweavers summon a Hero named Kayle and evolve her. Storyweavers gain max Health.

(@MinUnits@) Pick a supportive effect. @Health@ %i:scaleHealth%
(@MinUnits@) Pick a combat effect. @Health@ %i:scaleHealth%
(@MinUnits@) Pick a combat effect. @Health@ %i:scaleHealth%
(@MinUnits@) Ascend. @Health@ %i:scaleHealth%

Each Storyweaver star level increases Kayle's Health and Ability Power. Kayle gets @BonusASPerStage*100@% Attack Speed for each game Stage.

Trickshots' abilities ricochet. Each ricochet deals a percentage of the previous bounce's damage.

(@MinUnits@) @MaxBounces@ ricochet; @PercentDamage*100@% of previous damage
(@MinUnits@) @MaxBounces@ ricochets; @PercentDamage*100@% of previous damage
Place in the back two rows to get Trickshot, place in the front two rows to get Altruist!

The moon illuminates hexes, Shielding units placed in them at the start of combat.

Umbral units in illuminated hexes execute low Health enemies.

(@MinUnits@) @ShieldAmount@ Shield; @DesireExecuteThreshhold@% Health execute
(@MinUnits@) @ShieldAmount@ Shield; @DesireExecuteThreshhold@% Health execute. More hexes are illuminated
(@MinUnits@) @ShieldAmount@ Shield; @DesireExecuteThreshhold@% Health execute. Illuminate the whole board
(@MinUnits@) Executed enemies have a @DesireExecuteRewardPercent*100@% chance to drop loot; @DesireExecuteThreshhold@% Health execute

Wardens take less damage. For the first @Duration@ seconds of combat, they take an additional @StartOfCombatDRPercent@% less damage.

(@MinUnits@) @DRPercent@% less damage

Use the Arcana signifier item to choose a High Arcana champion. Each Arcana grants power based on a different condition.

Gain power for:
Ahri: Fielding 3-star champions.
Hecarim: Equipping items.
Tahm Kench: Activating traits.
Xerath: Purchasing Charms.
Emblem: Equipping Spatula items.

(1) Ascendant Charms can appear in your shop. The odds increase by @PercentageChancePerPlayerCombat@% after player combat, up to @MaxPercentageChance@%. When you buy one, the odds reset.

Current Odds: @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT12_AscendantOdds@%

Your team gains %i:scaleArmor%%i:scaleMR% @TeamwideResists@ Armor and Magic Resist.

Bastions gain more, and the value doubles in the first @Duration@ seconds of combat.

(@MinUnits@) @BonusArmor@ %i:scaleArmor%%i:scaleMR%
(@MinUnits@) @BonusArmor@ %i:scaleArmor%%i:scaleMR%
(@MinUnits@) @BonusArmor@ %i:scaleArmor%%i:scaleMR%
(@MinUnits@) @BonusArmor@ %i:scaleArmor%%i:scaleMR% and @NumUnits@ champions starting combat in the back 2 rows are invulnerable until 4 Bastions die

When Morgana's bats kill an enemy, they have a @PercentChanceToAbduct@% chance to abduct a 1-star copy of it.

In Choncc's Treasure, the chance to abduct increases at stage 3-1 and 4-1.

Blasters gain %i:scaleDA% Damage Amp, which increases for @Duration@ seconds after casting their Ability.

(@MinUnits@) @BaseDamageAmp*100@% %i:scaleDA%; @DamageAmpAfterCasting*100@% during burst

Chronos gain @BaseAP@ %i:scaleAP% Ability Power.

Combat start: begin a @Timer@ second countdown, which speeds up by @SecondsPerCast@ second after each Chrono Ability cast. At the end of the countdown, gain a special effect:

(@MinUnits@) Your team heals @MaxHealthHeal*100@% %i:scaleHealth%; Chronos gain @BonusAP@ %i:scaleAP%
(@MinUnits@) AND freeze time for @FreezeDuration@ seconds, Chronos keep fighting and gain @BonusAP@ %i:scaleAP%
(@MinUnits@) Freeze time for @FreezeDuration@ seconds, your team heals @TimeHeal*100@% %i:scaleHealth%; Chronos keep fighting and gain @BonusAP@ %i:scaleAP% and @BonusAS@% %i:scaleAS%

(@MinUnits@) Dragon attacks and Abilities @BurnPercent@% Burn and Wound enemies for @BurnWoundDuration@ seconds.
(@MinUnits@) The power of friendship upgrades all dragon Abilities!

Burn: Deals a percent of the target's max Health as true damage every second
Wukong does not have a trait bonus, but instead has a powerful Ability and increased stats.

When your team loses @HealthRatio*100@% of their Health, an Old God awakens. It gains @PercentHealthPerStarLevel*100@% Health and @APPerStarLevel*100@% Ability Power for each Eldritch star level.

(@MinUnits@) The Tainted Golem
(@MinUnits@) The Dark Monolith
(@MinUnits@) The Many-Eyed Beast
(@MinUnits@) The Stormbringer
Norra summons Yuumi to help your team! She can be attached to allies by holding her over them. Yuumi shares her Ability Power with Norra and dies when Norra does.

Faeries gain %i:scaleHealth% Health and create special items that become stronger with trait tiers.

(@MinUnits@) @BonusHealth@ %i:scaleHealth%, Gain Queen's Crown that grants @DamageAmp*100@% %i:scaleDA% Damage Amp
(@MinUnits@) @BonusHealth@ %i:scaleHealth%, Crown @DamageAmp*100@% %i:scaleDA%, Gain Queenguard's Armor
(@MinUnits@) @BonusHealth@ %i:scaleHealth%, Crown @DamageAmp*100@% %i:scaleDA%, Gain a 2nd Crown
(@MinUnits@) @BonusHealth@ %i:scaleHealth%, Crown @DamageAmp*100@% %i:scaleDA%, Items become Radiant

Only Faeries can hold Faerie items.

Frost champions gain %i:scaleAP% Ability Power and %i:scaleAD% Attack Damage. The first few enemies to die become allied ice soldiers which lure enemy attacks if they are within range and retargeting.

(@MinUnits@) @BonusStats@ %i:scaleAP%%i:scaleAD%, @NumStatues@ soldier
(@MinUnits@) @BonusStats@ %i:scaleAP%%i:scaleAD%, @NumStatues@ soldiers
(@MinUnits@) @BonusStats@ %i:scaleAP%%i:scaleAD%, @NumStatues@ soldiers, soldiers explode on death
(@MinUnits@) @BonusStats@ %i:scaleAP%%i:scaleAD%, @NumStatues@ soldiers, explosion power doubles

Soldiers have @HealthPerStage@ Health per stage.

Honeymancers gain @MiniCount@ Bees that deal magic damage to their target every @Period@ seconds. Each Bee deals damage based on the damage a Honeymancer deals and takes.

When a Honeymancer dies, they leave @NumTransfers@ Bees that follow nearby Honeymancers for the rest of combat.

(@MinUnits@) @BonusDamage*100@% of damage dealt, @DamageReceived*100@% of damage taken
(@MinUnits@) @BonusDamage*100@% of damage dealt, @DamageReceived*100@% of damage taken
(@MinUnits@) @BonusDamage*100@% of damage dealt, @DamageReceived*100@% of damage taken. Bees deal damage twice as often.

Hunters gain %i:scaleAD% Attack Damage, increased the first time they get a takedown each combat.

(@MinUnits@) @BaseAD@% %i:scaleAD%, @BonusADAfterTakedown@% after takedown
(@MinUnits@) @BaseAD@% %i:scaleAD%, @BonusADAfterTakedown@% after takedown
(@MinUnits@) @BaseAD@% %i:scaleAD%, @BonusADAfterTakedown@% after takedown. Also gain @BaseAS*100@% %i:scaleAS%.

Your team gains @TeamwideAP@ %i:scaleAP% Ability Power.

When Incantors attack or cast, all Incantors gain stacks of %i:scaleAP% up to @MaxStacks@. Every other attack grants @StacksPerAttack@ stack, and each Ability cast grants @StacksPerCast@ stacks.

(@MinUnits@) @BonusAPPerStack@ %i:scaleAP% per stack
(@MinUnits@) @BonusAPPerStack@ %i:scaleAP% per stack; your team gains @TeamwideAP@ %i:scaleAP%

Mages cast their Abilities twice and have modified total %i:scaleAP% Ability Power.

(@MinUnits@) @APMultiplier*100@% %i:scaleAP%
(@MinUnits@) @APMultiplier*100@% %i:scaleAP%
(@MinUnits@) @APMultiplier*100@% %i:scaleAP%
(@MinUnits@) @APMultiplier*100@% %i:scaleAP%, Mages cast MUCH more frequently

Multistrikers' attacks have a chance to trigger @NumBonusAttacks@ extra attacks.

(@MinUnits@) @ProcChance@% chance
(@MinUnits@) @ProcChance@% chance
(@MinUnits@) @ProcChance@% chance; heal @OnHitHealPerc*100@% max Health every attack
(@MinUnits@) @ProcChance@% chance; heal @OnHitHealPerc*100@% max Health every attack

Combat start: Portal champions Shield for @ShieldDuration@ seconds.

Objects from other dimensions fly out of a portal every few seconds to help allies and disrupt enemies. The portal becomes @IncreasePerStarLevel*100@% stronger for each Portal champion's star level.

(@MinUnits@) @ShieldAmount@ Shield, Small portal
(@MinUnits@) @ShieldAmount@ Shield, Medium portal
(@MinUnits@) @ShieldAmount@ Shield, Large portal
(@MinUnits@) @ShieldAmount@ Shield, GIGA portal

Your team heals for a percent of their max %i:scaleHealth% Health every @Duration@ seconds. If they're full Health, restore %i:scaleMana% Mana instead.

Preservers gain double the amount.


(@MinUnits@) @HealthPct*100@% %i:scaleHealth% or @ManaPct*100@% %i:scaleMana%

Your team gains @BaseASPct@% %i:scaleAS% Attack Speed. Pyro champions gain more %i:scaleAS% and execute enemies under @ExecutePct@% Health.

For each kill, Pyro champions create an infernal cinder that you collect the next round. For every @NumCinders@ cinders you collect, your team gains @ASPctPerNumCinders@% more %i:scaleAS%.

(@MinUnits@) @PyroUnitAS@% %i:scaleAS%
(@MinUnits@) @PyroUnitAS@% %i:scaleAS%
(@MinUnits@) @PyroUnitAS@% %i:scaleAS%
(@MinUnits@) @PyroUnitAS@% %i:scaleAS% and execute under @ExecutePct@% Health

Cinders collected: @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT12_PyroCindersCollected@
Team %i:scaleAS%: @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT12_PyroAttackSpeed@%

Briar gains %i:scaleDA% @TOOLTIPDamageAmpPerHealth*100@% Damage Amp for each player health you are missing. Each round, gain a Light Snack to give her @BriarHealthGain@ %i:scaleHealth% in exchange for @TacticianHealthToFeed@ of your player health.

In Choncc's Treasure, Light Snack's effect will be enhanced at stage 3-1 and 4-1.
After combat, Milio has a 40/60/100% chance to convert a temporary relic component into a real component.

Scholars gain bonus %i:scaleMana% Mana on attack and %i:scaleAP% Ability Power.

(@MinUnits@) @ManaPerAttack@ %i:scaleMana% per attack, @AP@ %i:scaleAP%
(@MinUnits@) @ManaPerAttack@ %i:scaleMana% per attack, @AP@ %i:scaleAP%
(@MinUnits@) @ManaPerAttack@ %i:scaleMana% per attack, @AP@ %i:scaleAP%, and Abilities heal an ally for @AllyHealing*100@% of damage dealt

Shapeshifters gain %i:scaleHealth% max Health. After their first Ability cast, they triple this effect.

(@MinUnits@) @BonusHealthRatio*100@% %i:scaleHealth%
(@MinUnits@) @BonusHealthRatio*100@% %i:scaleHealth%
(@MinUnits@) @BonusHealthRatio*100@% %i:scaleHealth%
(@MinUnits@) @BonusHealthRatio*100@% %i:scaleHealth%, and heal @MaxHeal*100@% %i:scaleHealth% every @HealDuration@ seconds
(@MinUnits@) @BonusHealthRatio*100@% %i:scaleHealth%, and heal @MaxHeal*100@% %i:scaleHealth% every @HealDuration@ seconds

Sugarcrafters build a layer cake from sugar. Gain sugar for each component your champions are holding after player combat.

They gain %i:scaleAD% Attack Damage and %i:scaleAP% Ability Power, increased by @BonusRatio*100@% for each cake layer. When the cake has reached @MaxLayers@ layers, gain treats instead!

(@MinUnits@) @SugarMultiplier@ sugar, @BaseAPAD@ %i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%
(@MinUnits@) @SugarMultiplier@ sugar, @BaseAPAD@ %i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%
(@MinUnits@) @SugarMultiplier@ sugar, @BaseAPAD@ %i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%, team gains @BonusHealth@ %i:scaleHealth%
(@MinUnits@) @SugarMultiplier@ sugar, @BaseAPAD@ %i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%, team gains @BonusHealth@ %i:scaleHealth%

Total: @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT12_Pastry_BonusStats@ %i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%
Layers: @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT12_Pastry_NumLayers@ / @MaxLayers@
Sugar per round: @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT12_Pastry_SugarToAdd@ = @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT12_Pastry_TotalComponents@ components x @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT12_Pastry_TraitSugarMult@ from trait

Vanguards gain @DamageReductionPct*100@% %i:scaleDR% Durability while Shielded.

Combat start and at @HealthThreshold*100@% Health: Gain a Shield for a percent of max Health for @ShieldDuration@ seconds.

(@MinUnits@) @ShieldPercentAmount*100@% max Health
(@MinUnits@) @ShieldPercentAmount*100@% max Health
(@MinUnits@) @ShieldPercentAmount*100@% max Health; 15% %i:scaleDR% while Shielded

Warriors gain %i:scaleSV% Omnivamp and %i:scaleDA% Damage Amp. When Warriors drop below @HealthThreshold*100@% health, they gain double %i:scaleDA%.

(@MinUnits@) @Omnivamp*100@% %i:scaleSV%, @BonusDamage*100@% %i:scaleDA%
(@MinUnits@) @Omnivamp*100@% %i:scaleSV%, @BonusDamage*100@% %i:scaleDA%
(@MinUnits@) @Omnivamp*100@% %i:scaleSV%, @BonusDamage*100@% %i:scaleDA%, also gain @DamageReduction*100@% %i:scaleDR% Durability

Witch Abilities apply a curse to enemies for @CurseDuration@ seconds. When a cursed enemy dies, the curse spreads to the nearest enemy.

Cursed enemies become:

(@MinUnits@) smaller, losing @MaxHealthReduce@ %i:scaleHealth%
(@MinUnits@) AND green, taking @CurseHealPct@% of their max Health as magic damage per second
(@MinUnits@) AND frail, taking @TrueDamagePct@% bonus true damage from Witches
